item.title: Will Ethernet Crush DS3?
item.description:
Companies needing more bandwidth than a 1.5 Mbps T1 line often upgraded to DS3, but its 45 Mbps speed was often more than they needed. A newer option, Carrier Ethernet (also known as Metro Ethernet), offers a more practical solution with scalable bandwidth at a often lower cost. Ethernet services are significantly less expensive than DS3 in some markets, costing up to 50% less. However, in areas where Ethernet isn’t widely available, prices may be comparable to DS3...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/will-ethernet-crush-ds3/
